Famous Duos & Teams.name: Dynamic Duos: A Partnership Puzzle
Famous Duos & Teams.description: Test your knowledge of iconic partnerships, from explorers to cartoon characters! This quiz explores the names and relationships of famous duos and teams throughout history and pop culture. Can you identify these legendary collaborations?

questions.text: What were the first names of the early American explorers Lewis and Clark?
What are the names of the two primary M&M's spokes-candies?
What are the names of Donald Duck's three nephews?
What are the Smothers Brothers' first names?
What are the names of the two primary M&M's spokes-candies?
Which of these is not a TV cartoon duo?
How are actors Charlie Sheen and Emilio Estevez related?
Who is the twin sister of 'Dear Abby' columnist Abigail VanBuren?
